text:
Cobalt | Senior Software Engineer | Onsite | San Francisco, CA | Competitive salary

Cobalt Engineering is hiring! We are looking for a talented engineer who can focus on helping scale the backend systems for our platform. If this is you or your friend, let's chat!

Cobalt increased annual recurring revenue by 300% this past year and is projected to grow by another 300% in 2018. This is a great time to join a promising young team that has nailed their product-market fit and is now looking to scale.

More about this role - https://cobalt-labs.workable.com/jobs/661864
